cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on November 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2250, Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 57 (Friday, March 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 2250.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1694]

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2021
